website_summaries.verdict: As it generates fewer false alerts, this is the best choice if your primary concern is getting more signal and less noise from a detector.
pros: Easy to set up and install
Customizable filtering really helps to limit the noise from false alerts, particularly those coming from luxury vehicles
cons: Durability issues, as some report that this detector fails fairly quickly
The silver top reflects in the windshield and is a distraction
Some issues with it not detecting laser radar

customer_reviews.title: WHEN IT SPEAKS YOU BETTER LISTEN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had more than 12 radar detectors, this is by far the most reliable DETECTOR. This thing is AWESOME!!! Bad to the bone!! WHEN IT SPEAKS YOU BETTER LISTEN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DWayne

customer_reviews.title: Poor Range - really bad
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers the range is *not* long. The cop needs to almost on top of you for it to alarm. My old Whistler did 10x better at long range but it finally bit the dust after years of service. Even at the most sensitive setting, this unit had very poor range, a big disappointment so back it goes for "Inaccurate description"...the title says "Long Range" but that is a big fat lie.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Performing with fewer false alarms
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than my older Cobra model, with fewer "false alarms" and quicker "real alerts". Nothing too fancy here, just a smple black and white screen with beeps and Voice Alert. This model advertises giving fewer "false alarms" for electronics in other vehicles, and I think it lives up to that claim. As with any radar detector, it can't be 100% perfect. But so far this one is performing great.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Till

customer_reviews.title: Saving $$$ on Tickets!
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector has already saved me several tickets while traveling down the East Coast. It is effective, has great range, good visuals and is from a well established company. The detector comes with a mount and the power adapter for your car. It is also fantastic that you can get such a deal on this on amazon (roughly half the price I have seen it at other vendors). I would highly recommend this cobra RAD350
customer_reviews.author: MitoMan

customer_reviews.title: epic fail
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this item in april of 2018 after previously owning a cobra radar detector. it is easy to use, and works (worked) as it should. one problem i had with it was the disconnect from the windshield bracket. the release tab on top of the device is hard to press down, and it's even hard to tell if you've even applied pressure at all. i tried filing the windshield bracket tab and applying graphite to it to make it easier to disengage, but it remained a problem. then, after owning it for only 5 months, it died completely. it may still be under warranty, but what the heck?
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Good as a $70 radar
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and use. You can control the volume with a nob. The LCD screen it's very easy to read and you can DIM it for night use. Nice feature the Car Battery Volts reading. Now the bad. It doesn't has a long range detection as describe. It detect the police less to a 1/4 mile, no more. A $70 radar do the same range of detection of this Cobra 450. For $149 for me it's over price for what you get, maybe $95 will be a good price. So I suggest to keep searching if you want a long range radar detector.
customer_reviews.author: GT1

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in advance of a cross-country driving trip. While I'm not a lead foot driver, I was looking for assurance that if a change in speed limit went unnoticed, I would be able to avoid a problem. This is definitely a "plug and play" unit. All the factory defaults are perfect for every driving condition I encountered. Yes, you do get a lot of false alerts, but they always read "1" so after the first couple of instances, you just learn to ignore those beeps. While I know there are many units out there with far higher price tags and many more bells and whistles, this one was the perfect solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: newmex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing picks up cops from a mile away on the interstate!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: For the price point this is totally worth it! I have used it on multiple trips and it’s definitely accurate. Saved me from getting a ticket coming around a bend in Arkansas. The IRAD function is pretty cool. You just download the app on your phone and Bluetooth sync it and wala! The app has a map and shows your speed, it will ask you if the detection is a false alarm or if the alarm was a police vehicle...very helpful...especially if everyone in the network is posting. Pros: Price IRAD network Easy user interface Cons: Need to adjust sensitivity at times The two suction cup setup isn’t always enough...I bought the tri-suction cup mount...works like a champ
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, looks amazing. Such a beautiful design. About a third of the weight of my ancient passport 8500. Hope it works and dodges some radar!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: great purchase. Fast service
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised with this detector. I just ended up laying mine on my dash on a sticky pad and I couldn’t believe how well it still detected radar and laser from in front and behind me without even being mounted on my windshield. Quality product, great purchase. Fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This radar is one of the best I’ve ever purchased! Completley accurate up to almost a mile away to avoid speedtraps and cops that are hiding while going on roadtrips! I definitely reccomend this protect to anyone looking for a Cobra product radar on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Serafin

customer_reviews.title: Replaced older Cobra.  So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Replaced an older Cobra that seemed to be having issues due to the constant exposure to direct sun from being on my dash. To be expected. For the price it's no biggie to buy a replacement every 4 years. Totally worth it when you drive over the speed limit like I always do. Used to get speeding tickets on a regular basis until I spent 79 bucks on my first Cobra. Never got another speeding ticket since the. I take it with me if I will be in rental car, especially in unfamiliar territory. Always saves me. Never an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Butler

customer_reviews.title: Handy little device!
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector has saved me a few times already. Going to work at 5:30 in the morning when not many cars are on the road it's good to have advanced notice when police are nearby also great for road trips. It also looks cool at night with a Night Rider display and voice alerts are a nice thing too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Garner

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product right after I got a speeding ticket on July 10th, 2019. Today is August 2nd and I decided to make a return, because this morning, the same police vehicle, a same officer with the same radar gun ar the same location detecting the speed, and this thing DID NOT MAKE A SINGLE NOISE. I am okay with tons of false alarm, as long as it works when there is really a radar gun around. PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON IT.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Not to self-incriminate, but I may have possibly gotten this in order to potentially reduce any further tickets after an alleged incident of speeding that may have occurred. I'm happy to say it has worked so far and has made me more alert of my surroundings and has presumably prevented more citations.
customer_reviews.author: Zavage

customer_reviews.title: I never used other brand than Cobra
customer_reviews.text: I have used the other model of Cobra for such as long time. I think I purchased it back in 2009 or 2010. But it just died suddenly the other day! Wow 9-10 years! I wanted to thank this little Cobra guy who worked for me for such a long time. I never had any issues with it. I am sure this new one will work for me for many years to come. Only complain about this model is that the window is narrow. The dashboard of my car is low so I can't see the window well. The window of the other model was twice higher. (Width is the same but the Height was twice longer/taller).
customer_reviews.author: Chameleon

customer_reviews.title: read my review, it’s worth your time!
customer_reviews.text: Listen. Fix the suction cups! This thing falls of my window sometimes and gives me a heart attack man! Aside from that it’s amazing. I’ve had 2 prior detectors. This is accurate, the only thing is once you’re hit with a laser it’s too late but that goes for any detector. I bough this because I LOVE THE VOLUME CONTROL. Ugh I cannot stress how annoying it is to turn on your car and it starts SCREAAAAMING. Like, the volume in this bus is ASTROOOONOMICAL. Therefore everything else is 10/10. Thanks for coming to my ted talk, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kandsass

customer_reviews.title: I have not gotten any speeding tickets since getting this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not gotten any speeding tickets since getting this item, and sometimes it has alerted me in plenty of time, but at least four times it did not detect anything when I went past police that I could see were shooting right at me. Not sure why it didn't detect those, or what band they were shooting, but made me concerned how well the detector was working. It was in NJ that this occurred. I tried upping the sensitivity to see if it helps, but now get lots of false alerts.
customer_reviews.author: Crias

customer_reviews.title: It’s.... acceptable. Kind of
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Not particularly accurate. If a cop is hiding on side of road parked perpendicular to the road you are driving, this radar usually won’t detect their radar. It also wont detect cops behind you but it will detect cops driving towards you Pros: Good at detecting speed cameras (including ones no longer in operation) The alerts are nice and loud (volume is adjustable too). Small like the size of a bar of soap. Very few false alerts in AZ. Will beep every time it detects a Walgreens/CVS Didn’t have high expectations for this radar and bought it to help avoid unfortunate situations until the day comes I suddenly feel like blowing $600 on a nicer one
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than 1 speeding ticket.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to replace another cobra. Install was same bracket and hardwire from about 6/7months ago. I have noticed less false positives, better reduction of the automatic doors and car autobrake/follow systems. Over all pleased. The wireless connect does work, participation from others is required to make it functional. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Every time the thing chirps it is potentially saving you money.
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and tired of paying lawyer and court fees to get your tickets reduced then get this simple to use device. Wife got it for me for my birthday and did a lot of research. It feels like one more pair of eyes looking just for police. In the world of distracted driving you can't always keep an eye out for the patrol cars, especially the unmarked ones (Durangos, F150s, etc) they in today. On top of everyother average Joe who is texting away while driving. Every time the thing chirps it is potentially saving you money.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Thurmond

customer_reviews.title: Don't even bet your time and money on this
customer_reviews.text: Really don't know where did all the good reviews came from. I travelled around 1300 miles in one month. It DOES NOT pick up the signal whenever the cop is parked perpendicular to the road, which is 99% of the times. It picked up the signal only once when the cop was half facing me, but the distance was too short to react. I would have got a ticket for sure if I was speeding. Another thing this pickes up is the speed radars on big screens which tells you your speed, and that's not why I got this radar detector for.
customer_reviews.author: YaphetSLLc

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work very well.
customer_reviews.text: So far I don't seem to have any problems with my Cobra RAD450. It apparently it alerts me far enough in advance of a "problem", yet false alarms are negated. Installation would have been easy, but I have decided to use a fuse split-er to power my unit more permanently. Of course with most automotive products, there should be a much better way to mount them to the windshield like the rear view mirror is. I might have to.look into that type of arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzardtoes

customer_reviews.title: Best radar detector
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST radar for the money (RAD 450) notifies you if cop has his radar or lidar on very far, from my experience it has already saved me multiple times from getting pulled over. Please purchase this BEFORE you get pulled over it will be worth it just within the first time it alerts you of a cop and you slow down. I made the mistake of waiting until I got a speeding ticket to purchase a radar. I did my research and this is the best radar detector for the money. You will 100% enjoy it as much as me.
customer_reviews.author: noor

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: You have to adjust the sensitivity or you’ll get false alarms even on the highway. Once adjusted it seemed to work and even gave me a couple of alerts that the wayze app did not. If someone with laser speed deTection hits your vehicle it alerts loud and clear. The first time it happens it’ll get your attention. I don’t have anything else to compare it to, but so far it and the suction cups have worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Will drain your battery
customer_reviews.text: The rador detector its self works great. Ever since I installed it, ive noticed my battery getting weak. Remind you, I have dual batterys new cables and a new alternator Within the last 6 months. Last week, my truck sat for a full day because I was working out of town, came home and it was completely drained. Ive since unplugged the radar, and not had an issue since I replaced my batteries AGAIN. So thanks...
customer_reviews.author: Matt_mason

customer_reviews.title: F The Police
customer_reviews.text: Spent the weekend driving around looking for police radar enforcement with my new Cobra. The device picked up bacon with the ‘K’ alert regularly and consistently in plenty of time for me to slow down and avoid trouble. False alarms are few and as you get used to it, it has everything you need in a radar detector. Most importantly, it trolls the pigs way ahead of time. On an open thruway, it was alerting me up to 1 mile away every time. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Giles

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I want to tell the experience of buying this product. This product arrived before the promised date. I am very glad this product arrived earlier. before buying this product I saw the reviews of other people who have already bought this product. but I see there are only a few reviews. I doubt this product. but when I read other people's reviews about this product. how surprised I am all the very good and convincing reviews. without thinking I bought this product. because I really need it. and how surprised I was again, when the goods arrived early. I immediately rushed to try, it turns out this product is amazing. I will not be disappointed buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Ettel

customer_reviews.title: Will not pick up laser at all
customer_reviews.text: Mine WILL NOT pick up lasers at all. I've already gotten 2 tickets because of it. Get a better and more reliable brand! I drove by a cop on the way home and I seen him pointing the laser. Drove right past him (doing the speed limit) and it didn't go off. I've passed less than 9 cops total that it didnt work at all when you can see them holding the gun. 2 were tickets and 1 was a warning.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: These work great. Very few false alarms
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to upgrade from older radar detectors that kept going off because of new technology in cars. These work great. Very few false alarms. Almost always a policeman when there is a beep.
customer_reviews.author: K. Green

customer_reviews.title: A great investment, works awesome
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I bought it 2 years ago after getting stopped all the time in 2017 and as soon as I plugged it in, I knew where almost all speed traps were! You can also set it to detect different bands (k, ka, x, specter, etc). You can set the brightness so it doesn't distract you at night and you can adjust the volume so it doesn't startle you. For $100 its worth buying if you drive a lot like me in a car that attracts a little too much attention.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Castro

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought a different one
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this as, OK, at best. When it gives you an alert, it starts off loud and then gets much more quiet, even with the volume all the way up. Not great if you have your favorite music cranked up. Also, there are times when it gets stuck. It will alert you and then it gets stuck in the alert mode even after you are well past the area. I have to disconnect the power and plug it back in to reset it. Overall, I'm not happy with it and wish I had chosen a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Baker

customer_reviews.title: Takes some time to configure to your environment, but then you're good to go.
customer_reviews.text: I find I have to change my settings as I stray from my typical travels, but false positives are pretty well nonexistent once you get it configured and this little guy can sniff out the fuzz for about a mile in advance. I don't do anything I'm not supposed to while driving, but having a detector just allows me to "tighten up" my driving demeanor when it goes off (it puts me at ease knowing I won't get ambushed suddenly). It's certainly not perfect in any facet, especially in regards to the additional doodads that are included, but the detector itself is a darn good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Pitcher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a fan of Cobra, I’ve had one of their old vedetta detectors in my first car for 5 years, so when I got my 2nd car I decided to keep the old detector (which still works perfect by the way) in my older car and get a new one for my new car, so this is the one I chose and I am just as happy if not happier with this one, I’ve had a couple false alarms on the spectre band so just ended up turning those alerts off, I live in a town where the police will pull you over for anything and all I can say is this thing does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Brandan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: First let me say it works. Yes cop cars will pass you by and it won't go off and it's because they are not running radar. Occasionally I'll get false activations from others cars in a nearby lane or in a parking lot it will go nuts from the door sensors but going down the road if works great. Occasionally it will be a little delayed in hilly terrain and if the cop just turns his radar on and off you don't have a chance, but I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Overall, it was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. It has saved his butt from speeding on the way to work in the mornings multiple times. The alarm will start going off and getting faster and soon enough u see a cop in the distance sitting or driving towards you in the other direction. The only thing I do not like is that sometimes it does not detect cops, but i assume they don’t have their lasers on. And the filters took between a cop and automatic doors are not 100% filtered. But I do not regret buying this, it was worth the money and my boyfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Necole

customer_reviews.title: Good radar detector but.....
customer_reviews.text: The window suction bracket is totally useless, mine fell all the time off the windshield and the included dashboard Velcro makes the detector too low. All that being said, I made it work and it's a decent detector, it seems to do what it needs to do. If they only would have included a LARGE single suction cup holder, everything would have been fine. Bad decision on Cobra's part not to include that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Good Value. Works in modern environment.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value at low price. Mostly eliminates the false car avoidance signals, overhead road speed sensors which I was picking up with my old unit. The display LEDs could be a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: DennisDrWho

customer_reviews.title: Good proformance for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used radar detectors for the last 15-20 years, and this is better than anything I've had in the past. While still more pricey than I would prefer, as these things go it is a good value. It has a lot of good features in addition to being sensitive and able to weed out many false alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Bob P

customer_reviews.title: Long distance pick up.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Me and my boyfriend got one and we drive an hour on the highway to work every day so this has really helped us. It picks them up way before they see you and not as many false pick ups.
customer_reviews.author: Leeah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Works great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and just plugged it in and sync it up to bluetooth and on the way to work it went off twice and sure enough a few blocks up the road there was 2 deputies with radar guns. Paid for itself within 15 minutes of installation. Also like that you can see on your phone others with the Cobra app where they are registering speed traps in areas your still not at yet so it gives you a heads up giving you plenty of time to react.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Burse

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Laser Detector!
customer_reviews.text: Love this detector. I can’t see why spending upwards of 3-4 hundred dollars for a comparable unit. This thing goes off when it should and zero false alarms. Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Linder

customer_reviews.title: Lots of false alarms
customer_reviews.text: To many false alarms. Doors, cruise control, even stuff at a cotton gin I haven’t figured out yet. Suction cups are ok but get super soft in the heat and it will fall off. Especially on bumpier roads. I would opt for the next one up. At least I can “program” false alarms. Supposedly
customer_reviews.author: david valadez

customer_reviews.title: cobra radar detector
customer_reviews.text: works real good but upon arrival when receiving the item the end tip that plugs into the cigarette adapter had an small crack in the end tip requested for an replacement, and the replacement was 1 week late upon arrival but overall a good device!~
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gee

customer_reviews.title: Works for us - has saves us $$ already.
customer_reviews.text: Got his for my wife - as she recently got a ticket in her new sporty car.... she wasn't a fan - but once installed - she likes it. she didn't think they worked - but it has warned her several times on open stretches of back roads, to watch her speed.... I've had one for decades - and I like that this one has a mute easy to reach, that comes back to sound after it doesn't detect anything. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: You're getting a ticket with this.
customer_reviews.text: I had a 2017 iRad and it was overly sensitive, but would always go off near police radar and signs. I paid $50. The new iRad as of 2020 barely works. I paid $150 and now I'm more likely to see the police car before it goes off. I'm not exaggerating. Other times ill pass a speed sign displaying my speed but it stays silent. Also the new unit produces more heat which is surprising, and for some reason the new one is even larger. The old one I could hide, but this one is like mounting a clown nose on your rearview mirror. GOOD - LUCK
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: It works but it has a serious flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The product does work and i have been using it for about 2 months and was able to fairly detect radar, but if you are in someones blind spot while they have a blindspot detection system consider yourself F***ed it will mute any signal it will receive until its out of it and thats how i got hit with a speeding ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Harper

customer_reviews.title: It works!!! KA from great distances
customer_reviews.text: Ok I had an older radar system purchased this and omg do I highly recommend and for the price ! Detects KA from very far distance and the 360 detection is accurate. No more faulse readings —- awwhhh. Also extermely easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: No more false alerts from lane assist/collision detection systems on other cars
customer_reviews.text: I love Cobra radar detectors. I’ve tried others, but keep coming back to Cobra. Finally they have built in software so you don’t get false alerts from lane assist and collision detection systems, and it’s updatable for future lane assist/collision detection systems. The display is bright and words are spoken clearly.
customer_reviews.author: bryan2103

customer_reviews.title: The boy that cried wolf detector
customer_reviews.text: Awesome at picking up radar at a disdance. But that also comes with false alarms. The high end vehicles. Have drive assist, it uses k band. This radar picks them all up. It sucks in that aspect
customer_reviews.author: Billy M.

customer_reviews.title: Fewer False alerts and connects to IRAD!
customer_reviews.text: Great device! Detects all bands in use, as far as I know. Less false alerts, connects to iPhone or that other one, for IRAD, a radar alert sharing App. Anyone posts, so to speak, a radar location, and it is immediately shared with everyone connected with IRAD. Excellent device!
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Radar Dectector!
customer_reviews.text: My wife's radar detector was over ten years old. So I got her this one for a present. She loves it. It is very accurate, and does not bother her with false readings as her old one did. I sometimes use her car, and I like it too. Cobra radar detectors have always been some of the best on the market, and this one I consider one of the best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Subjectus

customer_reviews.title: It’s a scam to sell a product.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the product, it says that has a long range but it do not. By the time it pick up the cop radar the cop has clocked you already. I have a $249 ticket to prove that it do not work well. I was so disappointed in the product. After getting the ticket I asked my brother which is a cop to check the distance with his radar gun and it clearly showed that by the time the radar pick up the cop the cop has picked you up as well. So that purchase was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Solid No Frills but all the Bells
customer_reviews.text: Been great! Sees them WAY BEFORE I DO. I've used it in cities and highways and so far it's been accurate. Easy to use and not many false alerts. I shouldn't really call them that as they are almost all from automatic doors of stores which you can easily bypass those.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Lingerfelt

customer_reviews.title: Safety and reliability.
customer_reviews.text: Paid for itself in three trips. Great sensitive. No false alarms so far. The smartphone app that can be coupled to the unit is very informative and up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Coxey

customer_reviews.title: It watch’s your back. (Don’t rely just on this for protection use your eyes 👀 also)
customer_reviews.text: K alert 🚨....... KA ALERT 🚨!!!!!!!!! Beeeeeeep this radar detector is amazing for it’s price if you like doing 80 90 get a radar there are a few false alerts maybe due to the sensitivity being at high overall it detects every trooper pushing radar I live in the city I never knew cops did radar in the city until this things beeps for KA 🤷🏽‍♂️🤷🏽‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: TheOperator

customer_reviews.title: Why would you buy it ?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this radar for the past month .All I could say is that the suction cup holder suck for some reason they don't stick well to the windshield .Also the radar doesn't reach that far compare to others I have try but I guess you pay was worth if that makes any sense but I'm not going to lie the radar built quality is very good and is also super easy to setup and get it ready for the road and avoid those tickets .I would give it 5 start only if it didn't have those two cons.hopefully my review was helpful to you .
customer_reviews.author: Mawee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this thing for about 3 months and didn't realize it wasn't working until I was on the phone with my while following her down the highway and heard her radar detector going off while mine was doing nothing. My detector has only went like 3 or 4 times that was when I was passing a Walgreens I pass everyday but I noticed it stopped going off for that as well. It connects to my phone and shows the speed limit but it doesn't do what I primarily bought it for. If my radar detector doesn't detector radars then it's useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Delacy

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: After cooking my last detector in the heat in the southwest, I needed a replacement. So far, I am very impressed with how this has worked for me. I like having the signal strength display on the front. My wife likes the fact that the tones generated are much more pleasing than my last one. And no tickets yet!
customer_reviews.author: J. DeJarnatt

customer_reviews.title: For the price, not so great.
customer_reviews.text: The mobile app in conjunction with the detector, is very glitchy. Needs improvement. Like a software update. The GPS and speed indicator lags constantly.
customer_reviews.author: RJironWeld

customer_reviews.title: Works better than all the others
customer_reviews.text: Has not failed to pickup any signal yet...does not pick up the blind spot indicators..picks up signals before you see the car...saved me $$$ already
customer_reviews.author: Alan R.

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from a ticket on the first day.
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play. I love it. Found a hiding cop on the first use. It started beeping so I slowed down and then the beeping got faster and faster and there he was. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product it was in a damaged box. Then upon further review of the item it looks as if the item had been dropped I have nicks and chips in the cobra radar device. I would like my money back I did not pay for a used product I paid for a new product.
customer_reviews.author: AARON

customer_reviews.title: Dunkin Donuts Detector
customer_reviews.text: This detector will alert you after a cop has passed you or as their about to pass you, rendering it useless. So far after several weeks of usage it's been a Dunkin Donuts and Speed Limit Detector. Everytime it actually does detect a cop, it's at a distance so close to you that you can see them before the detector does, making the whole thing useless. Do not purchase, buy a more expensive one away from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Saved me a lot of trouble. Don't trust it when you're coming over a hill or around a corner - cops use auto-on radars that aren't on until you're within sight, so this detector won't give you a warning. But generally, it's helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Fitzhenry

customer_reviews.title: Fixes the false signaling of older detectors.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, replaced my old detector since it was false signaling with all the K-band blind spot detection cars out there.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carling

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within one day
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within one day. The speaker stopped functioning and unlike previous devices the Filter for blind spot and collision avoidance did not work. I contacted both cobra and Amazon and so far neither has honored the refund policy or warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a ticket
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy installation. This thing is perfect if the police in your town are more into detect and collect as opposed to protect and serve. Always nice to know where they are even If you’re doing your best to be a law abiding citizen. I bought one for my friend Goose and he said it works great except for it starts to lose range somewhere in between mach 1 & mach 2 in his Tomcat.
customer_reviews.author: Wes the Mess

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It goes off on anything. I turned off several Chanel’s but it haven’t detect anything yet. I don’t know how to use it because it didn’t come with a manual.
customer_reviews.author: Duy Phan

customer_reviews.title: Well that was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Literally the only time it WASN'T beeping was when, you guessed it, when I actually drove past cops parked for speed traps. Never got a ticket because I didn't really trust it, but I would see a cop parked up ahead of me, look at my radar detector and verbally beg it to beep, and it wouldn't. The rest of the time, it was an unfathomably incessant, constant beeping. I returned it after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great performance, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage for all radar signals. Crisp and clean voice alerts. Different settings allow you to customize your alerts. I find myself getting an alert and eventually seeing the Police vehicle. It’s like keeping score. On the other hand, I find that I drive within the legal speed limits more consciously and purposely. It is very well designed and has a nice smooth, chiseled look. Good value at a good price. Glad I made the choice
customer_reviews.author: Angela L. Leibach

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of the false readings from my old ones. This one seems to cut them out very quick. So far I like it and bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: ... frequency your local PD uses to scan you can easily flag off false alerts (you’ll get a couple based ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well for spotting on the highways & on the roads Once you learn what frequency your local PD uses to scan you can easily flag off false alerts (you’ll get a couple based off if you’re in the city[more], on the highway[mostly real alerts] or in the suburban areas[hit or miss]) Clean sleek design Volume is adjustable which is a nice addition because I have it mounted in a place where it’s gonna catch my eye regardless of sound or not, so I typically don’t have it on full blare.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Wesley Crews

customer_reviews.title: Works extactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Works extactly as described, filters out all extraneous signals from other vehicles, ie. "Blind spot detection","Dynamic cruise control", etc.
customer_reviews.author: Excel Man

customer_reviews.title: Brand loyalty.
customer_reviews.text: I had an existing Cobra radar detector that mounted on the rear view mirror and got the power from the OnStar plug. The irad slid right on and powered up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Borsack

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but then let me down
customer_reviews.text: I've had for 5 months. Worked great until this past weekend when the alert was WAY late for a cop on the other side of a very small hump in the road. Got me at 78 in a 65. Had worked fine before with cops much further away and better hidden. Maybe he just turned is radar on? Don't know, but there was no lead up warning beeps. The detector just went nuts and it was too late.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Eken

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this cause it was a gift from my wife for my birthday but the thing is my birthday was a few days ago so I didn't get it till a few days ago so with that said I installed it and it don't work but the problem is she ordered it a while ago so now we're past the return date... Sucks for me... But I must say I've a cobra in my vehicle for the past 5 plus years and love them so guess I'm back to using the old one
customer_reviews.author: Robert cocchiaro

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the buy and worth the money. Would highly recommend buying this if you are on a budget. This radar is one of the best on the market if you don’t have $600 to spend on a top tier radar but you also don’t wanna buy a $20 radar that will go off to every single thing it picks up aka a false alert. I’ve had this radar for a couple months now and i can honestly say it has saved me from countless tickets. In my honest opinion it has paid its self off ten times over. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: I had another Cobra radar detector for 12 years very similar to this one. I loved it. This one is as good or better. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: princetonguy

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Works great saved my butt a few times just enough distance to get her slowed down b4 you see you know who coming at ya or behind you as well.
customer_reviews.author: shannon sprout

customer_reviews.title: Barely has any range at all
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to pick up on any radars behind me at all. Then randomly it will just show the X when out in the boonies by myself. It does pick up on K band well but only from about 300 yards away. Not worth it. Only good for seeing where a cop might be at night. I would not and will not rely on this.
customer_reviews.author: joeynotking

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for about a week and it does what it should. There are several cops parked out in known spots on my daily commute to work so I have gotten to test it out a lot. It typically detects from about 0.3-0.4 miles away, which is plenty of time to slow down. No false alerts yet even on maximum sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great early warning
customer_reviews.text: Great range. Gave me a warning 5 miles away in open flat road. The cop was 5 miles north of me ( checking the odometer), the signal started out weak and grew stronger as we approached each other. By the time he was a half a mile from me the signal was constant and the stregenth reading increased. Great value saved me 💰💰
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great radar. Super simple and works good for the time I’ve had it so far. Not to many false alarms, for the price it’s a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Herman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, haven't had any issues and the false alerts from NCD are almost gone.
customer_reviews.author: TrUsTiNnOoNe!

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quiet audio
customer_reviews.text: Detects radar okay but don't plan on listening to music or having a car that is loud at all if you buy this model. The sound is so damn quiet, my phone speakers are twice as loud. I got pulled over today because I didn't even hear the detector going off due to its lack of amplitude. So now Im out the money for this useless junk as well as a ticket that the detector failed to avoid. Good detection, horrible audio. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Graham Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a road trip. Made noises when there were no police around and then when there was a police scanning us it made no noise and we were pulled over. Do not recommend this product, did not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: BryanG

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! Saved from many tickets. Does filter out a lot of false alarms! My FAV feature tho is the differing of K and Ka band!!!! Cause usually around here K is like automatic doors at Walmart or shopping places and Ka is usually cops... so great knowing the difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome detector for the budget!
customer_reviews.text: A buddy of mine has a $500 Escort with GPS capability. He gets a little more range than me, and the gps memory function is nice, but not nice enough to make it worth the extra money. He also has a lot of false signals from vehicle proximity sensors. This detector has yet to have a false signal from said sensors. I pick up grocery store auto door signals occasionally, but after a few trips I know them by heart. I'm impressed by how well this detector sniffs out the speed traps. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M

customer_reviews.title: No Iradar and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet even on 10 setting compared to my other one, so if you use loud music it's not for you. Hope it does what it's meant to do. To early to say yet. Does not work with Iradar app.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: No different then the $30 ones!!
customer_reviews.text: Was told that this model has voice alerts. All it does is beeps and has no explanation. Not what I was looking for. I guess $80 isn’t enough to get a nice affordable radar detector. You don’t get something for nothing!! spend a little more and get a good one!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good for open Texas highways and interstates
customer_reviews.text: Good for open Texas highways and interstates. Picks up police radar at a good distance even if they are flipping instant on function on and off on cars up to a mile or so ahead of you.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great radar detector. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This Cobra radar detector has sniffed out ever speed trap I have come upon while driving with time to slow down. It works great on the hidden speed sign radar in the cities. Great product. Helps you to drive more responsibly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok product, poor range
customer_reviews.text: Had a $30 cobra for 3 yrs never got a ticket, gave a lot of false readings but when it was real the range was unbelievable. This is NOT the case for this product. Had it for a few months, got a ticket a few days ago. It does not pick up radar unless there is pretty much a direct line of sight and by then its too late. (I had it on most sensitive setting when i got ticket, and it was Ka not laser, should have got a reading much sooner)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Moody

customer_reviews.title: Po po ain’t gonna get me no mo!
customer_reviews.text: After countless tickets and trying to out run the police I finally decided to get a radar detector. I choose the cobra because of price and accuracy. So far it’s been great even though it says it filters out false alarms it still through a few false alarms. But it gets the job done so far it’s caught radar guns from far away. And caught hidden police with radar too. I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Scott Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Cobra 450
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay radar detector for the money it's very good at blocking out BSM and automatic doors but still false is sometimes not real long range on radar. I returned it because of the range after I returned it I missed it but then I got a Uniden R1 which is very long range. But cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: SO many false alerts!
customer_reviews.text: It has been a while since I purchased a radar detector. With some cross-country travel, I did my research and bought this best-value detector. Unfortunately, the constant false K-band and Ka-band alerts make this detector largely useless. In addition, it stayed silent during two obvious speed traps, which I avoided by being situationally aware and watching other drivers. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work in Uzbekistan
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I decided to buy for my son and unfortunately this radar did not work in Uzbekistan (south Russia), it absolutely does not catch any signal. It seems that this device only works in America, just waste money(((
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: So great! Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is super happy with this! His old one is junk in comparison! Cops can pull up behind you and it detects them! And it detects from much farther away than I have ever seen one do! Really cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer duplantis

product_meta.title: Cobra RAD 450 Laser Radar Detector: Long Range, False Alert Filter, Voice Alert & OLED Display
product_meta.description: Style:RAD450The RAD450 is one of the top-rated radar detectors from the industry leader, Cobra Electronics. With best-in-class patented technology and audible band identification and signal strength, you can focus on enjoying the drive. This long-range unit comes with everything you need to get started and is pre-programmed for both English & Spanish. Choose Cobra for unparalleled radar detection!
feature_bullets: FEWER FALSE ALERTS WITH COBRA’S PATENTED TECHNOLOGY - The IVT Filter TM system reduces false alerts from sources like collision avoidance systems so you hear only what you need to hear

LONG RANGE - In flat, open conditions the range is at least 2 miles. Please note that shorter range can occur if the officer is hiding behind a hill, around a curve, of if the officer is using an instant-on radar gun
EYE-CATCHING OLED DISPLAY - High quality display features band identification icons and numeric signal strength meter for an accurate and informed drive
INSTANT-ON READY - Quickly detects Radar guns so you have fast speed monitoring capabilities ready to go at all times
BUY CONFIDENTLY - With Cobra’s 1 year limited warranty valid only from “ships from and sold by Amazon.Com” and “ships from and sold by Cobra electronics official

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,224 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
